fields.description:
I want to distribute my App-source as file for publish them.
I click right mouse on the Projekt, Publish, Distribute.
On the right bottom corner, i show a progress bar for a one second and than nothing.
The Log show me an NullPointException at com.aptana.browser.support.WorkbenchBrowserSupport.createBrowser(WorkbenchBrowserSupport.java:98)  (fuel log in attachment).

The apps are corrent and for a few month i could destribute them on this way (Titanium Studio). So i try it with the old Titanium Studio and get the same Log but dont change any of the source.

I try it with 3 different computers with different os (2x osx, 1x windows) and on each the same NullPointException.

Please Help.
fields.environment: Windows 7, osX Maverics, osX El Capitanâ€Ž
